Description:
We are hiring for an IT InchargeLocation - DubaiSalary - AED 8000-10000/-We are seeking an experienced IT Incharge to join our client in Industrial Manufacturing industry in Dubai, UAE.The ideal candidate will have a minimum of 5 years of experience in IT management and possess strong technical skills. As an IT Incharge, you will be responsible for overseeing the day-to-day IT operations, managing the IT team, and ensuring the smooth functioning of the company's IT systems. This role requires a proactive and hands-on approach, as well as excellent problem-solving and communication skills.Responsibilities:Manage and oversee the company's IT systems, including hardware, software, networks, and servers.
Ensure the smooth functioning of all IT operations, including troubleshooting and resolving technical issues.
Lead and manage the IT team, providing guidance, training, and support to ensure the team's success.
Develop and implement IT policies and procedures to ensure the security and integrity of the company's data and systems.
Monitor and evaluate the performance of the IT systems, identifying areas for improvement and implementing solutions.
Manage and coordinate IT projects, ensuring they are completed on time and within budget.
Collaborate with other departments to understand their IT needs and provide effective solutions.
Stay up-to-date with the latest trends and technologies in the IT industry, making recommendations for improvement.Skills

Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field.
Proven experience in IT management, with a minimum of 5 years of experience.
Strong technical skills, including knowledge of hardware, software, networks, and servers.
Excellent problem-solving and troubleshooting skills.
Strong leadership and management abilities.
